explanation: The off-by-one error is in the loop that checks the diagonal going up-right. The starting row index must allow i-4 >= 0, so i needs to start at 4. The buggy line started at 5, which misses diagonals that start at row index 4. I changed for i in range(5, h): to for i in range(4, h): so the check includes the missing diagonal positions.
